Material used.Description: Fluorescence analysis of chimeric α-synuclein proteins to assess lag times and growth kinetics.

Readout description.Result Description: A53T substitution significantly altered growth kinetics compared to wild-type.
S87N substitution contributed to lag phase abnormalities when combined with A53T.

Material used.Description: NMR analysis of chimeric α-synuclein proteins to assess secondary structure propensities.

Readout description.Result Description: A53T substitution induced conformational changes in secondary structure.
S87N substitution influenced secondary structure propensities in combination with A53T.
